Description: WIGOS identifier series
WIGOS issuer of identifier
WIGOS issue number
WIGOS local identifier
WMO block number
WMO station number
Type of observing station, encoding using code table 0 02 001 (set to 0, automatic)
Year (UTC), the time of observation (based on the actual time the barometer is read)
Month (UTC), the time of observation (based on the actual time the barometer is read)
Day (UTC), the time of observation (based on the actual time the barometer is read)
Hour (UTC), the time of observation (based on the actual time the barometer is read)
Minute (UTC), the time of observation (based on the actual time the barometer is read)
Latitude of the station (to 5 decimal places)
Longitude of the station (to 5 decimal places)
Height of the station ground above mean sea level (to 1 decimal place)
Height of the barometer above mean sea level (to 1 decimal place), typically height of station ground plus the height of the sensor above local ground
Pressure observed at the station level to the nearest 10 pascals
Pressure reduced to mean sea level to the nearest 10 pascals
Geoptential height expressed in geopotential meters (gpm) to 0 decimal places
Height of thermometer or temperature sensor above the local ground to 2 decimal places
Instantaneous air temperature to 2 decimal places
Instantaneous dewpoint temperature to 2 decimal places
Instantaneous relative humidity to zero decimal places
Method of observing the state of the ground, encoded using code table 0 02 176
State of the ground encoded using code table 0 20 062
Method of observing the snow depth encoded using code table 0 02 177
Snow depth at time of observation to 2 decimal places
Intensity of precipitation at time of observation to 5 decimal places
Height of the anemometer above local ground  to 2 decimal place
Time period over which the wind speed and direction have been averegd. 10 minutes in normal cases or the number of minutes since a significant change occuring in the preceeding 10 minutes.
Wind direction (at anemometer height) averaged from the caterisan components over the indicated time period, 0 decimal places
Wind speed (at anemometer height) averaged from the cartesian components over the indicated time period, 1 decimal place
Highest 3 second average over the preceeding 10 minutes, 0 decimal places
Highest 3 second average over the preceeding 10 minutes, 1 decimal place
Highest 3 second average over the preceeding hour, 0 decimal places
Highest 3 second average over the preceeding hour, 1 decimal place
Highest 3 second average over the preceeding 3 hours, 0 decimal places
Highest 3 second average over the preceeding 3 hours, 1 decimal place
Height of the rain gauge above local ground to 2 decimal place
Total precipitation over the past hour, 1 decimal place
Total precipitation over the past 3 hours, 1 decimal place
Total precipitation over the past 6 hours, 1 decimal place
Total precipitation over the past 12 hours, 1 decimal place
Total precipitation over the past 24 hours, 1 decimal place
